en.genericBackend: Something went wrong while processing your request and someone was notified about it! Please try again later.
en.featureLimitPerRequest: You reached the feature limit for this tool. Submit your request and continue adding features.
en.polygonAreaTooLarge: Area of this polygon is too large. Please draw a smaller polygon.
en.featureLimitPerRequestZonalTS: You reached the feature limit for this tool. Delete the current polygon using the 'x' in the table below, draw a new polygon and submit the request.

si.genericBackend: Med obdelavo vaše zahteve je prišlo do napake. O tem smo nekoga obvestili. Poskusite ponovno kasneje.
si.featureLimitPerRequest: Dosegli ste omejite števila objektov za to orodje. Z dodajenjem boste lahko nadaljevali po potrditvi trenutne izbire.
si.polygonAreaTooLarge: Površina poligona je prevelika. Narišite manjši poligon.
si.featureLimitPerRequestZonalTS: Dosegli ste omejite števila objektov za to orodje. Izbrišite trenutni poligon z 'X' v spodnji tabeli, narišite nov poligon in potrdite izbiro.
